title: ‘நாளைய முதல்வர்’ சர்ச்சையில் அமைச்சர் சி.விஜயபாஸ்கர்- முழு விவரம் இதோ!
author: tamil.factcrescendo.com
vclaim: GM. Am at my constituency #Viralimalai today. Rendering support to my people at this crisis is my responsibility.providing essential supplies, rice bag & atta to 75,000 families today at their doorstep. #HelpingHands #StayHomeStaySafe #COVID__19 #Vijayabaskar #CVB pic.twitter.com/VuZ0pmhTn7
